body.description: Ginger Lily Farms Club & Fitness Aloe Vera Moisturizing Conditioner smooths, restores and revitalizes dry hair with lasting moisture for incredibly soft, shiny hair. Our moisturizing conditioner works with your hair’s natural oils to deeply penetrate every hair strand and improve the overall health, look and feel of your hair. Dry hair is instantly restored and revitalized. Ginger Lily Farms Club & Fitness Hair Conditioner is enriched with naturally derived botanicals to provide weightless hydration to all hair types and is paraben, sulfate, phosphate and gluten-free. The cruelty-free conditioner is 100% vegan and PETA certified. Recommended for commercial use in locker rooms, hair salons, and home use for refills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have long hair and this is a good enough conditioner to make my hair soft and untangled,. I don’t like to spend a lot of money on hair conditioner and this does what I need. There is a pleasant scent and it washes away nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very smart purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand
reviews.reviewText: Love the quantity! Love how it makes my hair soft and shiny! This is a much better deal since it last 4 girls with long hair about 3 months!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Moisturization - Great for Pre-Poo, Conditioning Washes
reviews.reviewText: Note: My hair texture is 3c/4a, low porosity, thin strands (but a lot of them), and is bra-strap length.I purchased this conditioner as a replacement for a discontinued product I used from a mainstream beauty supply store. The original conditioner had a simplistic ingredient list, no fragrance, and quickly absorbed into my hair.The Ginger Lily conditioner is a viable substitute - but keep in mind that I only intend to use this product as either a pre-washing treatment to soften my hair to aid the detangling process, or for when I use conditioner to "wash" my scalp in lieu of shampoo.For this purpose, it's a great product - it's efficient at providing a lightweight level of moisture (not to the same level as the product I'm replacing, though), without adding any weight or buildup.Having said that, I cannot imagine being able to use this conditioner as my primary conditioner as it doesn't provide enough of...I hate to say it, but anything. It doesn't provide enough penetrating and long-lasting moisture for protective and nourishing purposes. It definitely didn't provide enough slip for me to detangle my hair without causing damage.But the caveat is that my specific hair type simply needs a more of a powerhouse conditioner. That isn't to say that this product couldn't be viable for other hair types (such as straight), or hair that doesn't need as much moisture to keep it happy.For this conditioner's price point and volume of product, I'll definitely repurchase it because I go through A LOT of conditioner. But I'll make sure that my expectations for its usage is primarily geared toward my hair prep process, and not my hair maintenance process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not too shabby
reviews.reviewText: I was worried if this would work because it wasn’t expensive and you got alot. I actually really like this conditioned. My daughter and I have long hair so we go through alot of conditioner. This smells good and leaves our hair soft! I will be buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For the price it is only okay.
reviews.reviewText: After using this for about a month I have decided to not use this. I'll probably give it away to someone who doesn't have longer hair and it's too worried about moisturizing their hair.I have to use a heck of a lot more then other brands I have used in order to get a similar result. Even then, it's subpar. Unless you like the "vegan" and "cruelty free" aspects or if this happens to be the only stuff you can use due to a skin condition or something, I would recommend using something else.The savings from buying in bulk I think is offset from the cost of having to use handfuls of this stuff. I shampoo my hair, then condition and let the conditioner do it's job until I'm done showering then rinse the stuff out. That's my routine. I have to use about five times the normal amount to get anywhere close, and my hair cannot soak up anymore and I might as well be bathing in it. You would probably get better results putting olive oil in your hair, and you can buy that in bulk for the same price and use way less.Getting past the volume I have to use in order to compensate how poorly this does with my hair. The smell isn't that great. While I'm not one to really care about the fragrance products give off, I hate cologne and perfume, this stuff just doesn't smell "clean" if that makes sense. It would be like bathing in lake water, sure your clean but you probably don't smell good.If you have short hair and don't mind the smell, this might be the best stuff you can pick up and will last you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You will love this stuff my hair loves this stuff I can easily brush my hair after I shower which not many shampoo and conditioner I can use this is the best the aloe Vera has a floral scent. I like mango best. Plus the clean ingredients used man I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is thick, lite scent, the amount that has to be used was four times more and it made our hair frizzy.
